description: Students have the opportunity to work in depth on a research project of interest under the supervision of a member of the psychology department faculty. Prerequisite: Statistics 110, 212 or 263, Psychology 230, four additional courses in the department, and permission of instructor. Psychology 298 is strongly recommended. Offered each semester.
name: IR/Neuroscience & Emotion
prerequisites: Statistics 110, 212 or 263, Psychology 230, four additional courses in the department, and permission of instructor. Psychology 298 is strongly recommended. Offered each semester.
